item.title: My pnpc. Not working?
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }
My first Pnpc

}else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }

item.title: My pnpc. Not working?
item.dc:creator: @Narbscape Narbscape
item.description:
@Narbscape wrote:

I did search in client.java twice, here are both npc commands:
1st one:

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } } if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights == 3))

2nd one:

}else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } } if (command.startsWith("moremoney") && playerRights >= 2) {

Can someone PLEASE look at these and tell me why they won’t work

Read full topic
